section.name: Tools, Frameworks and Libraries we used

subsection.name: Jadabs
subsection.p: Jadabs is a dynamic lightweight container for small devices in a distributed environment.

subsection.name: Apache Jakarta Tomcat
subsection.p: Tomcat is a web server that functions as a servlet container.

subsection.name: Apache Jakarta Tapestry
subsection.p: Tapestry is a powerful framework for creating web applications in Java.

subsection.name: Cayenne
subsection.p: Cayenne is a powerful, open source Java Object Relational Mapping framework.

subsection.name: Postgresql
subsection.p: PostgreSQL is an SQL compliant, open source object-relational database management system.

subsection.name: JAIN-SIP Proxy Server
subsection.p: A Java SIP Forking Proxy with presence server support.
This is evil, but we had no other choice ...

section.name: Tools we didn't use, but should have
